p: Taking example of the current wastewater discharge regulations, the government should set policies and regulations for HWW discharge, improve and strengthen the relevant regulations of HWW, and strictly limit the limits of pharmaceuticals and pathogens in HWW. The government should be actively attending to the carrying out of the regulations and strictly supervise the hospital to follow the regulations. The hospitals should strictly implement the regulation for reduce the content of pharmaceuticals and pathogens in HWW before discharged.
